Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: CEC Lang - California Electrical Code Agent

Features:
- LangChain-based agent with Groq API (Qwen3 32B)
- Hybrid search (OpenSearch + Google embeddings)
- Deterministic table lookups for CEC/NEC
- Custom enforcement loop (anti-hallucination, exception search)
- Streamlit web interface
- Evaluation framework with 30 questions (100% pass rate)

pause

echo.

start """" http://localhost:8501
streamlit run interfaces/streamlit_app.py
pause
